backend/main.mo: Motoko backend storing and managing route metadata with authorization checks and CRUD/query functions for routes.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking gameplay features to source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files including game world, truck, UI panels, and route systems.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for frontend global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML page bootstrapping the React app and loading the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app managing game mode, route loading, panels, and UI layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthStatusB: Auth status component showing signâ€‘in state and hosting the login/logout button.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication with loading and error recovery.
React hook that initializes and updates Web Audio oscillators to simulate engine and road sounds based on speed and acceleration.
frontend/src/game/camera/FollowCamera.ts: Three.js camera component that smoothly follows a truck with different offsets and behavior depending on game mode.
frontend/src/game/GameView.tsx: Main 3D scene combining world geometry, truck, camera, audio, NPC traffic, and route visualization.
frontend/src/game/routes/ActiveRouteStat: Zustand store tracking the active route, current waypoint, and distance updates as the truck moves.
frontend/src/game/routes/RouteCreatorSta: Zustand store managing draft route creation, including waypoint CRUD, reordering, metadata, and validation.
frontend/src/game/routes/RouteEditorPane: UI panel for editing and saving custom routes, handling waypoint management, metadata input, and persistence.
frontend/src/game/routes/RoutesPanel.tsx: UI panel listing saved routes with load and delete actions, showing metadata and author-based permissions.
frontend/src/game/routes/RouteVisualizer: Three.js component rendering waypoint markers and a smoothed path line for a route, highlighting progress states.
frontend/src/game/traffic/NpcTraffic.tsx: Creates and updates NPC cars with deterministic randomness, moving them relative to the player's truck and rendering them with instancing plus individual models.
frontend/src/game/ui/HUD.tsx: Displays driving HUD elements such as speed, controls help, audio toggle, and route info based on game mode and truck state.
frontend/src/game/utils/deterministicRan: Implements a simple deterministic LCG-based random number generator with float and integer helpers.
frontend/src/game/vehicle/Truck.tsx: Defines a controllable truck with keyboard input, physics-like movement, and exposes state via an imperative handle.
frontend/src/game/world/GasStop.tsx: Renders a detailed gas station scene with textured canopy, pumps, pillars, and signage.
frontend/src/game/world/HighwayAndBridge: Builds a highway and bridge environment using textured road surfaces, lane markings, guardrails, and structural supports.
frontend/src/game/world/PowerLines.tsx: Generates utility poles with textures, random variations, and optional guy wires, then renders them along with overhead cables.
frontend/src/game/world/World.tsx: Builds the main world scene including textured ground, road, lane markings, and environment features like power lines, highway, and gas station.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing related queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and handling login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for fetching, saving, and deleting route data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind-based styling and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query and identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography, animations, and plugin integrations for the frontend styling system.
project_state.json: Defines the project state, including goals for realistic road environments, required images, and a list of existing features and requirements.
